title: User Registration and Email Verification
description: Verify that a user can register successfully, receive email verification, and verify their account correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page.
Input valid registration details including email and password.
Submit registration form.
Verify registration is successful and confirmation message is shown.
Receive email verification link.
Click on the verification link.
Verify the account is marked as verified in the system and user can login.
Attempt registration with duplicate email.
Verify an appropriate error message for duplicate email is displayed.

title: Login with Valid and Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login success using correct credentials and failure handling with incorrect credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input correct email and password.
Click login button.
User is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard.
Logout.
Input invalid email or password.
Click login button.
User login fails with proper error message.
Input unverified email credentials and attempt login.
Login is denied with a message instructing the user to verify email.

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Ensure users can request password reset, receive email, and reset password securely.

steps.description: Navigate to forgot password page.
Submit registered email for password reset.
Receive password reset email with a secure link.
Click on reset password link.
Enter new valid password and confirm it.
Submit new password.
Password is updated and user can login with new password.
Submit invalid or expired reset token.
Show error message and prevent password reset.

title: Dashboard Data Load and Visualization
description: Verify dashboard loads quickly, displays accurate financial overview, charts, recent transactions, and quick actions work correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard page.
Dashboard financial overview loads with correct income and expenses.
All charts render with accurate data visualizations.
Recent transactions list loads with correct data.
Use quick action buttons e.g. add transaction.
Quick actions open the related modals and function correctly.
Verify performance metrics and loading time does not exceed thresholds.

title: Transaction CRUD with Filters and Virtual Scrolling
description: Test creation, reading, updating, and deletion of transactions with filters and verify virtual scrolling functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to transactions page.
Create a new income transaction with proper category and details.
New transaction is saved and visible in the transaction list.
Update existing transaction details.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
Delete a transaction and confirm.
Transaction is removed from the list and database.
Apply various filters like date range, category, amount.
Filtered list displays only transactions matching criteria accurately.
Scroll through a large transaction list.
Virtual scrolling loads data dynamically for performance with no UI glitches.

title: Category Management with Icons, Emojis, and Colors
description: Verify user can add, edit, and delete income and expense categories with customization options including icons, emojis, and colors.

steps.description: Navigate to category management page.
Create a new category with selected icon, emoji, and color.
New category is saved and visible with correct customizations.
Edit an existing category to change icon, emoji, or color.
Changes persist and reflect correctly in categories list and related transactions.
Delete a category that is not in use.
Category is removed successfully.
Attempt to delete a category in use.
Appropriate warning or prevention of deletion with clear messaging.

title: Financial Reports Generation and Export
description: Verify generation of financial reports with accurate data, charts, tables, and exporting capabilities to PDF and Excel.

steps.description: Navigate to reports page.
Select date range and report type.
Reports load with accurate data visualizations and tables.
Export reports as PDF.
PDF file downloads and content matches displayed report.
Export reports as Excel.
Excel file downloads with correct formatted data.
Apply filters and export data.
Export contains filtered data only.

title: Savings Goal Creation, Tracking and Notifications
description: Ensure users can create savings goals, track progress visually, update or delete goals, and receive notifications about goal status.

steps.description: Navigate to savings goals module.
Create a new savings goal with target amount and deadline.
Goal is saved and progress shown accurately.
Update goal progress by adding savings.
Progress visualization updates accordingly.
Delete an existing goal after confirmation.
Goal is removed from userâ€™s list.
Wait for notification about nearing deadline or goal achievement.
User receives timely notification regarding savings goal.

title: User Settings Persistence and Theme Toggle
description: Verify user can update profile, theme preference, notification settings and changes persist on reload including theme switching between dark and light modes.

steps.description: Navigate to user settings page.
Update profile details like name, email.
Profile updates are saved and reflected in the UI.
Toggle theme from light to dark mode.
UI changes to dark mode and setting is saved.
Reload application.
Selected theme persists and loads correctly.
Modify notification preferences.
Preferences are saved and notifications behave accordingly.

title: Data Export in Multiple Formats with Filtering
description: Test data export functionality produces correct files in JSON, CSV, Excel, and PDF with filters applied.

steps.description: Navigate to export data modal.
Apply filters for date and category.
Select JSON format and export data.
Downloaded JSON file contains correct filtered data.
Select CSV format and export data.
CSV file downloads and data matches expectations.
Select Excel format and export data.
Excel file downloads with accurate filtered data.
Select PDF format and export data.
PDF export matches filtered data and formatting is correct.

title: Secure Account Deletion with OTP Verification
description: Verify account deletion requires one-time password (OTP) verification and securely deletes all user data upon confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to account deletion page.
Request OTP for account deletion verification.
OTP is sent to registered user email or phone.
Enter correct OTP and confirm deletion.
Account and all associated data are deleted securely.
Attempt to delete account with invalid OTP.
Deletion is blocked with appropriate error message.

title: Subscription Plan Selection and Checkout Process
description: Verify users can select subscription plans, complete checkout successfully, and manage their active subscriptions.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription management page.
Select a premium subscription plan.
Complete checkout payment process.
Subscription is activated and confirmation is displayed.
Verify subscription status and plan details in user profile.
Cancel or change subscription.
Subscription management reflects updates correctly.
Try to access premium features without subscription.
Access is restricted and user is prompted to subscribe.

title: Real-Time Notification Delivery and Management
description: Verify real-time notifications are delivered promptly and can be viewed and managed by the user.

steps.description: Trigger an event that causes a notification (e.g., savings goal nearing deadline).
Notification appears in the dropdown with relevant content.
Open notification dropdown from UI.
Notifications are listed correctly with timestamps.
Mark notification as read or delete it.
Notification state updates and is removed or marked accordingly.
Test notification handling under offline and reconnection scenarios.
Notifications are synced and consistent after connection recovery.

title: Financial Calculator Accuracy and Input Validation
description: Test percentage and compound interest calculators return correct results for valid input and handle edge and invalid input gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to percentage calculator page.
Input valid values and calculate percentage.
Results are accurate matching expected mathematical outputs.
Input invalid or empty values.
Calculator shows validation errors or prevents calculation.
Navigate to compound interest calculator.
Input principal, rate, time, and compounding frequency with valid values.
Calculator returns correct compounded interest and total amount.
Test boundary cases such as zero or very large inputs.
Calculations remain accurate and UI handles input safely.

title: Admin Panel Access Control and Functionalities
description: Verify that only authorized admin users can access the admin panel and perform system and user management tasks.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin panel as a non-admin user.
Access is denied and user is redirected or shown error.
Login as admin user and navigate to admin panel.
Admin panel loads successfully with system and user management options.
Perform user management actions such as disabling or deleting users.
Actions complete successfully and system state updates.
Perform system configuration or monitoring tasks.
Admin functionalities behave as expected.

title: Theme System Dark and Light Mode Toggle
description: Verify the theme system properly toggles between dark and light modes with correct UI context updates across the entire application.

steps.description: Navigate to any page with theme toggle.
Toggle theme from light to dark.
Entire UI updates to dark mode style.
Toggle back to light mode.
UI reverts to light mode style without visual glitches.
Refresh the page.
Selected theme persists correctly across reloads.
